content:
During the day, the Aviation of Defense Forces struck 13 areas of personnel, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

The missile troops were affected by 2 areas of personnel concentration, air defense and 4 important enemy objects.

Recall the occupiers the mostStoreIn the Novopavlovsky direction - 20 attacks.

As reported by the Armyinform, special forces dronesDestroyedmortar position and 5 invaders.
title: Aviation of Defense Forces made 13 blows on the occupiers and their technique
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about it. The missile troops were caught ...
author: Army Inform
